mahinda himi mawathe dayawansha jayakodi saha samagamaye nawa poth pradarshanagarayedi dorata wadi.digamandulle awyaja gamiyage jiwana puwatha, sithum pathum geththamak lesa mema nawakathawen gena harapayi.maranthitha dengu wasangathaya pilibandawa janathawa danuwath kirima wenuwen prasiddha shilpin rasakage sahabhagithwayen patigatha kala githa hayak athulath kara gunapala karunapathirana wisin nirmanaya kala ‘albopiktas’ nam nawathama keti natya pasal, daham pasal, wishesha awastha saha prasiddha sthanawala nomilaye ranga dakwimata katayuthu yoda atha.‘mada peradiga‘, puran kethe pambaaya’ wani wedika natya da ‘ira handa yata’, ‘nimak nathi sasara manga’, ‘awurudu udanaya’ wani eekangika teli natyawala nishpadaka adhyaksha lesa katayuthu kala gunapala karunapathirana 2009 wasaredi dengu uwaduren walaki sitimata janathawa danuwath kirima sandaha kalubowila, dakunu kolambaa shikshana rohale kala sangamaya samanga ‘sathiyakata warak’ namin widi natyayak aarambha kaleya.parisaraya, dengu maduruwan bowima walakwima, dengu rogi lakshana menma prathikara pilibanda paniwidayak janathawa atharata gena yama wenuwen nirmanaya kala ‘albopiktas’ natyaya pilibanda wadidura thorathuru 0722905915 / 0114900234 durakathana ankayen laba gatha haki we.oostreliyawe melbarn nuwara wishwa rangayathanaya pawathwagena yanu labana narthanacharini rashika kulasinhage wijaya kuweni inginaluwa mema masa 05 wanida nelum pokuna mahinda rajapaksha rangahale di ranga gathawe.
